page.title: 02Land Cover Survey
page.content:
The land cover survey in the whole of our area showed that crops were the primary use for land cover.Our area has 16 farms and is rural with little industry.Crops such as wheat,barley and oats are grown.Some farms keep cattle and sheep.The secondary land use on our survey was grassland most of which was used for grazing for cattle and sheep.
There is very little woodland covering,and it is mostly deciduous.
There are no large rivers running though our area.There is Formarke Reservoir nearby which supplies our area with water. There are no coal mines actually situated in our area but there are several coal mines in the surrounding area.
